GSP31samkhsuu:20: (bandhasya svābhāvikatvānupapattiḥ), si na kālayogato vyāpino nityasya sarvasambandhāt |
GSP31samkhsuu:44: (bandhasya avidyānimittakatvanirāsaḥ), si na vayaṃ ṣaṭpadārthavādinaḥ vaiśeṣikādivat |
GSP31samkhsuu:45: (bandhasya avidyānimittakatvanirāsaḥ), pū aniyatatve 'pi nāyauktikasya saṃgrahaḥ, anyathā bālonmattādisamatvaṃ |
GSP31samkhsuu:48: na bāhyābhyantarayoḥ uparajyopañjaka bhāvo 'pi deśavyavadhānāt srughnastha pāṭaliputrasthayoriva
GSP31samkhsuu:55: (bandhasya viṣayavāsanānimittakatvanirāsaḥ), pū nāsti hi tatra sthira eka ātmā yo garbhādhānādikarmaṇā saṃskriyate |
GSP31samkhsuu:76: śūnyaṃ tattvaṃ, bhāvo vinaśyati, vastudharmatvāt vināśasya |
GSP31samkhsuu:150: bhāve tadyogena tatsiddhiḥ, abhāve tadabhāvāt kutastarāṃ tatsiddhiḥ |
GSP31samkhsuu:168: yat saṃbaddhaṃ sat tadākārollekhi vijñānaṃ tat pratyakṣaṃ |
GSP31samkhsuu:315: (vastutattvaviparītataya puruṣe kartṛtāyāḥ buddhau jñātṛtāyāśca bhāne hetuḥ), pradhānakārya vimuktamokṣārthaṃ svārthaṃ vā pradhānasya |
GSP31samkhsuu:555: rūpaiḥ saptabhiḥ ātmānaṃ badhnāti pradhānaṃ kośakāravadvimocayetyekarūpeṇa
GSP31samkhsuu:595: bahubhiryoge virodhaḥ rāgādibhiḥ kumārī kaṅkaṇa (śaṅkha) vat |
GSP31samkhsuu:698: (vyāptisvarūpaṃ tatsādhanaṃ ca), pū niyatadharmasāhityamubhayorekatarasya vā vyāptiḥ |
GSP31samkhsuu:699: (vyāptisvarūpaṃ tatsādhanaṃ ca), si na tatvāntaraṃ vastukalpanāprasakteḥ |
GSP31samkhsuu:722: (vedasya atīndriyārthatvanirākaraṇaṃ), pū na yajñādeḥ svarūpato dharmatvaṃ vaiśiṣṭyāt |
GSP31samkhsuu:871: dvayoriva trayasyāpi dṛṣṭatvāt na tu dvau |
GSP31samkhsuu:873: vāsanayā na svārthakhyāpanaṃ doṣayoge 'pi na nimittasya pradhānabādhakatvaṃ |
GSP31samkhsuu:875: ekaḥ saṃskāraḥ kriyānirvartakaḥ na tu pratikriyaṃ saṃskārabhedā bahukalpanāprasakteḥ |
GSP31samkhsuu:893: na bhūtacaitanyaṃ pratyekādṛṣṭeḥ sāṃhatye 'pi ca sāṃhatye 'pi ca |
GSP31samkhsuu:905: yathā duḥkhāt kleśaḥ puruṣasya, na tathā sukhābhilāṣaḥ |
GSP31samkhsuu:1032: [i.e., Tattvasamāsa, an abstract of Sāṃkhya philosophy]
